formatDescription: The Presentation Manager Metafile format is a raster and vector image format originating from IBM’s OS/2 operating system.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: OS/2 Presentation Manager Metafile (MET)
internalSignatures.note: BOF, offset 2: Header begins with a variable 2-byte header size value, followed by 0xD3A8A8 ‘Begin Document’ field.

developedBy.name: IBM Corporation
developedBy.address: 1133 Westchester Avenue, White Plains, New York, 10604
developedBy.source: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
